meta.name: description
meta.content: Edinburg, is a closely knit community which strongly emphasizes the value of providing a good education. The ECISD encompasses 945 square miles which makes it one of the largest in the nation. It offers 3 high schools, 5 middle schools, 27 elementary schools, and 1 alternative campus. The District has approximately 30,000 students and 3,900 employees.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: School, Public, Academic, Football, Student, Central Administration, Edinburg, Texas School, The Place to Be

img.h1: Edinburg Consolidated Independent School District Home

h2.a: Welcome to the Edinburg CISD... Your District of Choice!

div.div: The Edinburg CISD provides strong academic, fine arts, and athletic programs for over 34,500 students at 31 elementary schools, 6 middle schools, 4 high schools, and 1 alternative and 1 credit recovery campus. We serve a school community rich in culture and tradition where a high quality education is emphasized for all. Welcome to the Edinburg CISD!

h3.a: US News ranks all 4 ECISD high schools among best in nation
Edinburg Rotary honors ECISD Migrant Education Program
Edinburg CISD awarded national Best Communities for Music Education
Edinburg CISD donates medical supplies to children’s hospital

h2.a: Edinburg CISD CONTINUES TO GARNER ACADEMIC RECOGNITIONS AND DISTINCTIONS

div.div: Edinburg CISD's recognitions and distinctions for the 2020 school year:
It is the policy of Edinburg CISD not to discriminate on the basis of gender, age, handicap, religion, race, color, or national origin in its educational programs.
Es politica del Distrito Escolar de Edinburg el no discriminar por razones con base en genero, edad, religion, raza, color origen nacional, ni discapacidad dentro de sus programas educacionales.
